name: Truncate links in WorkFlowy
description: This style truncates your WorkFlowy links to any length you choose. The default is 250px. When you hover over your link, it expands. Especially helpful with Markdown inline image and embedded links. Thanks to this commenter (http://bit.ly/2gp760T) for providing the CSS code.
